ValidationRule.description: When an Opportunity is lost to a competitor company or platform, field "Competition" is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISBLANK(Competition__c), CloseDate>=DATE(2019,01,01), OR( ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Lost to Competitor"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Salesforce Platform Loss") ) ) && $Profile.Name != "System Administrator"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Add the name of the competitor or platform this deal was lost to, in field "Competition"
